column5: You may want to check the expiry date on your Ontario Outdoors card,the cards expire at the end the 3rd year.The Ont MNR don't send reminders or renewal applications.I just wanted to give this advice for those of you that renew online so you have plenty of time,
you can't get a license without a valid outdoor card - it's almost an automatic reminder - when the card is up you have to re-up when you get a license. phish

Also remember that the license is now printed on the card so if you get a one year license you will need to carry paper licenses the last two years, but if you get a three year everything will be on the card until it expires.
Thanks for the reminder. I renewed my card today.
Also check the expiration date on your passport.
thanks for the reminder on the outdoor card, as a friendly reminder, also check your passport expiration. Keep in mind it will take longer to get a pass port, than a license or outdoor card.
